means: [人名] [英格兰人姓氏] 汉迪可能是绰号，含义是“双手灵巧的”(skilful with one's hands)

lj.lj_ly: the sort of junk that might come in handy one day.
lj.lj_ls: 这种废旧物有一天可能会派上用场。

entry.def: Something that is handy is useful.

example.ex: The book gives handy hints on looking after indoor plants...
example.tran: 这本书提供了一些关于如何照料室内花草的有用信息。

example.ex: Credit cards can be handy — they mean you do not have to carry large sums of cash.
example.tran: 信用卡很方便，有了它你就不用携带大量现金了。

entry.def: If something comes in handy, it is useful in a particular situation.

example.ex: That key will come in handy if you lock yourself out...
example.tran: 要是你把自己锁在了屋外，那把钥匙就派上用场了。

example.ex: The $20 check came in very handy.
example.tran: 那张20美元的支票正好派上了用场。

entry.def: A thing or place that is handy is nearby and therefore easy to get or reach.

example.ex: It would be good to have a pencil and paper handy...
example.tran: 最好在手边准备好纸和笔。

example.ex: Keep handy a lightweight sweater or cardigan...
example.tran: 手边备一件薄的套头毛衣或开襟毛衫。

entry.def: Someone who is handy with a particular tool is skilful at using it.

example.ex: If you're handy with a needle you could brighten up your sweater with daisies.
example.tran: 如果你针线活做得好，可以在自己的毛衣上绣几朵雏菊做点缀。

sentences.sentence: "found a handy spot for the can opener"

auth_sentence.content: Handy, if you want to make serious money.
auth_sentence.res_content: Handy, if you want to make serious money.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Handy, if you want to make serious money.

auth_sentence.content: Remember the many different handy power supplies ? Dr.
auth_sentence.res_content: Remember the many different handy power supplies ? Dr.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Remember the many different handy power supplies ? Dr.

auth_sentence.content: Plus it is on plenty of handy bus routes.
auth_sentence.res_content: Plus it is on plenty of handy bus routes.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Plus it is on plenty of handy bus routes.

stems_affixes.value_cn: 英俊的,慷慨的, 美观的
stems_affixes.word_buile: hand手+some充满……的→adj.英俊的,慷慨的, 美观的
hand手+y……的→手可以拿得到的→方便的
hand手+i=in进入+cap帽→指古代彩票赌马将罚金置于帽中→设置不利条件
hand手+le反复动作或物→n.柄,把手,拉手

stems_affixes.value_cn: 分发的印刷品, 新闻稿
stems_affixes.word_buile: hand手+out出去→用手发出去→分发的印刷品
hand手+i=in进入+cap帽→指古代彩票赌马将罚金置于帽中→设置不利条件

Sentence.sentence: Facebook is a handy site, but I'm upset by the idea that my information is in the hands of people I don't That's too high a price to pay.
It's all very handy stuff, I guess, a convenient way to be a do-it-yourself without being all that good with tools.

sentences.en: A good toolbox is a handy thing to have in any house.
sentences.cn: 任何一个家庭都应备有一个好的工具箱以便随时使用。

sentences.en: Our flat is very handy for the school.
sentences.cn: 我们的住所离学校很近, 非常方便。

sentences.en: She is a handy girl who can turn her hand to anything.
sentences.cn: 她是个心灵手巧的姑娘。

sentences.en: She is handy with the needle.

jushi.english: She is a handy girl who can turn her hand to anything.
jushi.chinese: 她是个心灵手巧的姑娘。

jushi.english: A good toolbox is a handy thing to have in any house.
jushi.chinese: 任何一个家庭都应备有一个好的工具箱以便随时使用。

jushi.english: It is quite a handy sailing boat.
jushi.chinese: 那是一只容易驾驭的帆船。
